attributes.action: GIVE REFUGEES FROM ZIMBABWE THE RIGHT TO EMPLOYMENT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
IF REFUGEES FROM ZIMBABWE WERE ALLOWED TO BECOME EMPLOYEES IN THIS COUNTRY, IT WOULD PROBABLY HELP PEOPLE LIVING IN ZIMBABWE, BECAUSE SOME MIGHT SEND MONEY OR FOOD PARCELS TO THEIR STARVING RELATIVES.

BIBLE QUOTE 

Thou shalt neither vex a stranger, nor oppress him; for ye have been strangers in the land of Egypt. 
(Exodus 22:21)

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
